title: Queen Margot 1994
description:
Amazing French period piece with the ageless Isabelle Adjani. Hollywood can only dream of creating a film with such lush detail and passion. 

This is from a 1994 dvd and unfortunately it is a poor transfer (not unusual back in the early days of dvd). Looks a bit washed out, which is why I opted to encode at a higher resolution. It is a two and a half hour movie though and worth the wait. 

720x348 in French with hard-coded English subtitles
